description.value:
To become a thief, one must have a certain level of determination and focus to allow delicate acts quickly and with a high variety of unpredictability. One must also know every trick in the book to get themselves out of danger and into your pockets.

As a street rat, you gain the following Thief abilities:

Thief’s Focus (1 Finger)

When making a Sleight of Hand or Stealth check, before knowing the result, you can spend 1 Finger to increase the result by +5.

Catch!

You can pass an item no heavier than 6 lbs to another creature up to 20 ft away. So long as the creature can see you, is willing, and is capable, they automatically catch the item.

Quaff

You can drink any potion or potion-sized drink as a Minor Action instead of an Action.

system.requirements: Must have the Rogue Starter Abilities
